sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> who usually hits you with a <radical>stick</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> finds it in his <radical>heart</radical> to give you some <kanji>leisure</kanji> time.
meaningInfo: You fall to your knees, "Oh thank you for not hitting me with your stick and letting me relax!" You haven't had a moment of leisure in ages!
readingMnemonic: You're just about to start your <kanji>leisure</kanji> time when a group of <reading>you</reading>ths (<ja>ゆう</ja>) appears with their own sticks. You look back for the leader, and he's wearing a bathrobe, sunglasses, and is drinking some hot cocoa. Wait... this is leisure time for... HIM?! OH NO!
readingInfo: As the leader leisurely watches, the youths smack you with their sticks. What a cruel world! "Enjoy your leisure time," the leader yells over, "the youths hit much softer than I do. Have fun!"
